alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:10AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, eastern Pushmataha, Latimer and central Le Flore Counties through 145 AM CST... At 109 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Damon to 4 miles northwest of Rattan. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Clayton... Panama... Talihina... Wister... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Rattan... Albion... Octavia... Talimena State Park... Snow... Tuskahoma... Mc Curtain... Kiamichi... Whitesboro... Clayton Lake State Park... Damon... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southeastern and east central Oklahoma.
